DOC.detailed_description: This study protocol approve institutional review board Chang Gung Medical Foundation . The usability assessment focus actual use propose rehabilitation system clarify issue user would face actual system operation , thus provide reference subsequent system improvement . Pre-testing formal testing conduct Chang Gung Memorial Hospital Taoyuan . The pre-test conducted five healthy participant , formal testing conduct 12 participant ( 4 stroke patient , 4 caregiver , 4 therapist ) . The healthy participant age 20-70 year old physical disability ; stroke patient normal cognitive language skill , stable stroke status , fracture upper limb previous three month , minimal upper limb spasticity Modified Ashworth Scale 0 1 ; occupational therapist work experience hospital one year . Prior experiment , subject provide basic biographical information . The investigator explain experimental process demonstrate operation device . For usability assessment , subject operate device instruction researcher , problem observe question ask record . Following device operation , subject fill system usability scale ( SUS ) questionnaire obtain subjective evaluation recommendation device . Experimental instrument consist rehabilitation device , video camera , still image camera , digital voice recorder , questionnaire observational recording form . The result SUS questionnaire analyze use SPSS ( IBM Corp. , Armonk , NY , USA ) . The split-half method use reliability analysis one-sample test comparison .
